Edges-Priest -- Female Human Seasoned Priest
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d10 Strength: d4 Vigor: d10
Skills (18 Points):
Alchemy: (sma) d4 Fighting: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Athletics: (agi) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Repair: (sma) d4
Boating: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Faith: (spi) d10 Performance: (spi) d6 Taunt: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Blind+: -6 on visual tasks
Holy Symbol: May reroll Faith when holding holy symbol
Thin Skinned: -2 vs. Taunt
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 4; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Priest); Aura Of Courage; Holy/Unholy Warrior; Mercy Hindrances: Blind+; Shamed; Thin Skinned Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Priest): Has Holy Symbol, Miracles, and Vow+ features
Blind+: +1 Edge Points
Miracles: May take edges particular to Arcane Background (Miracles)
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 7 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Kevlar Riding Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Mini Crossbow (2d4 R6" AP 1); Silver-tipped Stake (d4+d4 R2"); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Aura Of Courage: R10" Allies gain +1 vs. fear and -1 on fear table results
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Priest): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Holy/Unholy Warrior: May spend 1-4 Power Points to add an equal amount to a Soak roll
Mercy: R10" May spend 1 PP to remove Distracted, Vulnerable, or Shaken from target
